lead_paragraph: RUBEN--Lawrence. The partners and staff of Berdon LLP mourn the passing of our client and good friend Lawrence Ruben, under whose guidance Lawrence Ruben Company maintained a tradition as one of the most respected and successful development, management and leasing companies in New York. Our fondest thoughts go out to his wife Janet and his children, Richard, Lenore, and Shelly, his grandchildren, and great-grandchildren. We will all miss him dearly. 1/3
